title: Coronavirus: Evening update as PM's condition 'improving'
description: Five things you need to know about the coronavirus outbreak this evening.
content:
Here are five things to bring you up to speed with the coronavirus outbreak this Wednesday evening. We'll have another update for you on Thursday morning.
1. PM's condition 'improving'
